citations.narrative:
Three enclosures have a row of cracked tiles by the west wall. I felt some of the cracked areas and they weren't sharp,
however the cracked areas are collecting soiled material and can't be readily cleaned and sanitized. Surfaces that dogs
contact must be maintained so that they are readily cleaned and sanitized. To help protect the health of the dogs ensure
to repair or replace the cracked flooring in these areas so that the whole floor can be readily cleaned and sanitized.
***Correct by 5 July 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(2)(ix) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Three enclosures have a row of cracked tiles by the west wall.  I felt some of the cracked areas and they weren't sharp, 
however the cracked areas are collecting soiled material and can't be readily cleaned and sanitized.  Surfaces that dogs 
contact must be maintained so that they are readily cleaned and sanitized.  To help protect the health of the dogs ensure 
to repair or replace the cracked flooring in these areas so that the whole floor can be readily cleaned and sanitized.  
***Correct by 5 July 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
